Dive deep into your captivating backstory and those of your friends, peeling away the layers of mystery that shroud their lives... Aside from the central mysteries, Hakuba School is brimming with hidden stories, conspiracies, and personal journeys, ensuring 3-4 hours of gameplay.

Go around the school !:

Explore Hakuba School! Roam freely through the school's hallways, classrooms, and hidden corners.

item.title: DarkStorm
item.description:
About This Game

Long ago, humanity was ambushed by a mysterious alien race. Many perished—while those who survived were forced to find refuge in the mountains. Many years have passed, and the survivors cannot continue their refuge in the mountains. They must return home...

Play as MARS (Machine of Absolute Retaliation and Safeguard), a robot programmed to exterminate the treacherous aliens who have taken over Razor City. As MARS, you must free Razor City from its domination in order to save the survivors from their doom.

In DarkStorm, you must fight endless waves of aliens. As you pass each wave, the map grows larger, allowing you to explore more. Random collectibles will be spawned throughout the map, including health, ammo, weapon upgrades, and random weapon crates. There are three types of enemies, a Bat, Brute, and Crab. Each enemy has a special set of skills, so you have to watch out as you fighting them. The game includes only one gamemode, which is the endless wave. Once you pass wave 8, the map is completely open for you to explore.

item.title: Kitten Burst
item.description:
About This Game


Hapi, a down on their luck racing cat, teams up with a hacker named S4br aboard the cybership “The Eternal September”. Together they travel to abandoned sites, siphoning energy to power their ION Drive. Can the team pull off their scheme, or will the future of cyberspace be controlled by the megacorp PANDO?

WHISKERS


[Width/Height Intersect Sensing Kinetic Energy Recovery System] Generate Burst energy by flying close to walls and obstacles. Surf through levels to set quicker times.

BOSS BATTLES


Challenge a cast of boss characters to battle. Survive an onslaught of attacks long enough to drain their energy.

CIRCUITS

Scattered throughout the sites are circuits to race in. The quicker your time the more IONs each circuit generates. Plan out and perform the fastest lines through the world.

CATS ARE SOLID/LIQUID

Shift your state of matter to alter your burst power.

  • Solid: Increase your acceleration and top speed
  • Liquid: Slow down time and increase maneuverability.

item.title: Cube War
item.description:
About This Game

Cube War is an exhilarating 2D shooter set in the depths of space. Players take on the role of galactic nomads tasked with exploring and defending a galaxy teeming with enemies composed of various geometric shapes.

In Cube War, the adversaries come in the form of unique geometric shapes. Triangular warships, square tanks, and even round drones present players with a variety of strategic challenges.

Controls

Movement: W/A/S/D

You fire automatically.



By defeating the enemies, you will increase your level and fight more challenging and more enemies and try to reach the highest level.

item.title: AutoHeroes
item.description:
About This Game

Attention:


This game does not support matchmaking with random opponents. It is designed to be played solo or with your friends on Steam. You can try the demo version, which is identical to the main game, except that you cannot choose heroes. The demo version can also be played with your friends on Steam.

The game:


AutoHeroes is a ‘one hero’ autobattler with elements of roguelike and the ability to play in multiplayer. Control one of the four heroes who fight each other for the throne on random maps - both as each for themselves and as part of teams. Manage your hero through priority setting, as well as skill and equipment upgrades. Study your enemies and counter them with your plan!



The kingdom has lost its king and is in turmoil - no one understands what will happen next. Will the kingdom fall into the hands of a good hero, who will inspire the guard to serve him as the new king? Will the supporter of the dark forces, who prefers to rule the kingdom of the dead, prevail? Or maybe it will be that hero who combines both good and evil?

Game features:


  • Auto-battler: no rush during the game.
  • One hero: no armies, no "deck-building"​ - focus only on your hero.
  • Flexible settings: customize AI strength and teams, or invite friends to play PvE or PvP.
  • Priority system: regulate which objects and which enemies interest you first, and which last.
  • Skill wheel: choose skill schools and master them. Experiment and look for the best combinations.
  • Kindness or Malevolence: Persuade guards to join your cause or compel them to battle on your behalf even after their demise.
  • Assassin or Tactician: Choose to be an aggressor who strikes enemy heroes at the first chance or a strategist who benefits from prolonging each round.
  • Scouting: play for fun or seriously worry about countering your opponents.
  • Four heroes to choose from: warrior, archer, fire mage, or dark mage.
  • Random maps filled with enemies - each map is different from the previous one!
  • Fight with formidable opponents - dark knights, ghosts, even dragons!
  • Finally, fight your main enemy and main threat in all game modes - other AutoHeroes.

item.title: UpWorld - Multiplayer
item.description:
About This Game

Are you ready to rise to the challenge and become the hero you were born to be?

Embark on a breathtaking journey unlike any other in "UpWorld - Multiplayer," a parkour adventure that will challenge your skills, your heart, and your sense of wonder. Reach for the skies as you scale towering cliffs, navigate treacherous chasms, and defy gravity in your quest to reach the mythical Upworld.

You are the chosen one, entrusted with the sacred "Celestial Relic" - a mission that will take you through a world teeming with wonder and enchantment. Encounter a cast of mystical creatures and characters who will aid you on your journey, from wise guardians to imprisoned angels, all of whom have destinies entwined with yours. As you ascend, you won't just face challenges; you'll forge deep connections. You will also challenged by some Puzzles.

Discover hidden powers and abilities as you progress, enhancing your parkour skills and empowering you to overcome even the most daunting obstacles. otherworldly landscapes will leave you in awe, from lush, magical forests to towering, crystalline spires. Your adventure begins now in "UpWorld - Multiplayer," where the fate of a world rests on your shoulders.

Are you ready to rise to the challenge and become the hero you were born to be?

item.title: Robo Rob
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Robo Rob!

Robo Rob is an intensively challenging puzzle game crafted to push your patience to the limits. Start your journey with 21 intricately designed levels that promise to deliver both frustration and triumph. But that's just the beginning – we regularly roll out new batches of maps, each set ramping up the difficulty and fun factor. Are you ready to take on the ever-evolving challenges of Robo Rob?

item.title: Runaway bride
item.description:
About This Game

In a world where acceptance and understanding are still evolving, lives a young woman named Rachel.
Rachel is a lesbian who proudly embraces her identity and love for another woman. However, her family, bound by tradition and societal expectations, insists that she marry a man. Rachel's heart sank as she faced the daunting prospect of a loveless marriage that would rob her of her true self. She struggled with conflicting emotions, torn between her own desires and the need to obey. Despite the enormous weight on her shoulders, Rachel decided at the last minute to find a way to live life on her own terms. With unwavering determination, Rachel decided to run away from her wedding. Rachel's journey won't be without its challenges, so help her through with perseverance and determination. Challenge society's expectations and prove that true happiness can only be found when you truly live.

The main idea of the game is that you, as bride, has to run away from the wedding. 10 different people, like family members and friends will do their best to catch you, so you must be very quick and careful. To be able to pass to the next level you have to take the key which randomly appear on the scene. At this moment, the game has 10 different levels. If you have been caught you are going back to the first level.

Each character has its own, unique story which you can read.

item.title: Jelly Belly
item.description:
About This Game

Jelly Belly - is an exhilarating action arena shooter where players engage in relentless combat against an endless stream of diverse monsters. In this dynamic game, you'll face a constant challenge as the number of enemies and damage levels steadily increase. Your goal is survival and complete annihilation of enemies using a varied arsenal.

Features:
  • Endless Waves of Monsters: Battle against constantly increasing numbers of unique and dangerous monsters to test your skills and endurance.
  • Progressive Damage Levels: The game's difficulty continually rises, escalating tension and demanding strategic thinking and quick reactions from players.
  • Diverse Arsenal: Utilize a wide selection of unique weapons to deal with various types of monsters. From exploding projectiles to powerful energy waves, you have everything you need to survive.
  • Upgradable Weapons: Improve your weaponry as you play, enhancing effectiveness and adding tactical variety.
  • Arena Panic: The dynamic atmosphere creates a sense of constant danger, compelling players to act decisively to stay alive and complete each wave of monsters.

item.title: School Curse3
item.description:
About This Game

Game Title: School Curse 3

Genre: Horror

Overview:

A girl wakes up in a school one day. However, this is not her usual school, but a strange dimension filled with mysterious monsters. The girl must collect 10 magical books to escape this dimension.

This dimension was once a place where an evil power was sealed. However, the seal was broken, and the evil power has returned, causing the dimension to reappear.

The girl must escape this dimension.

Gameplay:

The game is played from a third-person perspective. The player controls the girl as she collects the magical books.

If the girl is spotted by a monster, she will be attacked and the game will end.

The game ends when the player collects 10 magical books. Once 10 books have been collected, the girl can escape the dimension.

The player can avoid monster attacks by hiding in a moving locker.

Features:

This is a horror game set in a strange dimension filled with mysterious monsters.

The player can experience a thrilling escape game as they collect magical books.

The game is full of tension as the player avoids monster attacks and searches for magical books.

As the third installment in the School Curse series, the game features connections to the previous games.

Target Audience:

All ages

Number of Players:

1

Playtime:

About 5 minutes

Difficulty:

Intermediate

Release Date:

February 2024

item.title: School Curse2
item.description:
About This Game

Title: SchoolCurse2

Genre: Horror

Release Date: January 2024

Platform: PC

Description:

A sequel to the popular short horror game, SchoolCurse.

In a cursed school, you must collect 10 magical tomes to break the curse.

But be careful, the school is crawling with alien-like monsters.

Explore the school, find the tomes, and escape the curse.

Two modes are available: Normal and Hard.

Normal mode is similar in difficulty to the original game.

Hard mode provides a more challenging experience.

This game is recommended for fans of the original SchoolCurse and horror games in general.

Target Audience:

Fans of the original SchoolCurse
Horror game enthusiasts
Overview:

SchoolCurse2 is a short horror game that is the sequel to the popular game SchoolCurse.

The game is set in a cursed school at night.

The player controls a girl named Sakura who must collect 10 magical tomes to break the curse.

The game is played from a third-person perspective.

Players must explore the school to find the tomes.

However, the school is also home to alien-like monsters.

If the player is caught by a monster, they will be killed.

The game features two modes: Normal and Hard.

Normal mode is similar in difficulty to the original game.

Hard mode provides a more challenging experience.

SchoolCurse2 is a great choice for fans of the original game.

It is also a good option for horror game enthusiasts who are looking for a short and challenging game.

Review:

SchoolCurse2 is a more challenging game than the original, but it is still a lot of fun.

The atmosphere of the school is creepy, and the monsters are scary.

Normal mode is a good challenge for fans of the original game.

Hard mode is a good choice for players who are looking for a more difficult experience.

SchoolCurse2 is a great choice for fans of the original game or horror games in general.

item.title: 雪鹰领（Cultivating Immortals）
item.description:
About This Game

Everyone yearns for immortality, and for ordinary people, the most coveted place is undoubtedly the Cultivating Immortals, a place of cultivation. It is said that the Cultivating Immortals was divided into eighteen territories by demon forces, where fairy grass was everywhere and demons were rampant. Therefore, this place became a paradise for cultivators. There are often powerful cultivators here who practice hard and eventually soar to the sky. This place not only contains treasures left by the ascending sages, but also those cultivators who bravely died here for immortality. Perhaps you will bravely kill demons due to a spiritual herb, a secret script, or a relic, or compete with your companions for resources. No matter what method you choose, you will embark on an unprecedented adventure where you will learn about Taoism, practice demon killing, and treasure hunting, all for the ultimate goal of immortality. Let's jointly uncover the veil of this mysterious land!

Cultivating Immortals is a multiplayer cultivation competition game.

The current version has launched single person cultivation mode and multi person interaction scenes. Including: lifespan system, realm system, combat system, magic system, boss system, drop treasure system, Chat system, legacy system, and multi scenario PVE.

In the later stage, it will be open: mount system , multi scenario PVP, larger magical system, weapon system, equipment system, managed auction house, alchemy system, sect system, multi universe system, creation of small world system, etc

This is currently the first version, and the game will be updated five times to present exciting content to players.

Current version: Mainly aimed at improving cultivation by collecting herbs, eliminating low-level monsters to obtain fairy magic secrets, learning advanced fairy magic, and then going to eliminate high-level monsters.
At present, the multiplayer mode has poor support for non China regions, which may result in inability to connect to the server, causing both parties to be invisible.

item.title: Death of Marionette
item.description:
About This Game


Sawyer and her friends arrive at a ruined factory to prepare an event. While everyone’s busy, Sawyer experiences something strange inside the building.
Sometime later, Huck Finn, Sawyer’s boyfriend, arrives at the factory with some friends after receiving a text message from her...



  • An RPG Maker style adventure game with real time combat - clear your path with your trusty Steel Pipe. Enhance yourself and your weapons with items found on your adventure.
  • Beautiful illustrations and pixel sprites - Enjoy tens of pictures made by the main artists LuB2an and Coinman.
  • Moody piano music - 22 soundtrack pieces written by the artist Antler and the developer Gustav

item.title: ZAKESTA-Z
item.description:
About This Game

Shootung fights on all 5 sides with normal shots that power up by 5 stages and sub-weapons that power up by 3 stages.
You can consume a gauge to generate a circle called "Z-ZONE", and items captured within that range can be turned into high-scoring items.

*Select from 3 modes: "NORMAL", "ZOGEN" where the game rank changes, and "ZUTTOZ" where the highest rank is fixed.

*6 types of sub-weapons
[0] Fires a bullet that attacks in the opposite direction of your aircraft's movement.

[1] Emits a huge laser.

[2] Damages enemies and enemy bullets with a barrier.

[3] A ball rotating around your aircraft deals damage to enemies and enemy bullets.

[4] Fires a bullet that explodes when it hits an enemy.

[5] Fires a bullet that guides the enemy.

*Detailed explanation can be found in the Community Hub guide.

item.title: Snake Crush
item.description:
About This Game

The Ghost Dragon has truly been killed, and the spiritualized dragon vein once again rises into the sky, tearing a passage between reality and the spirit world. A massive influx of spiritual energy and sinister forces floods into the magic city, empowering countless monsters and demons, causing them to wreak havoc in the human world once again.
The Investigation Bureau has no choice but to dispatch their staff members who are most capable of withstanding the dragon's power, a group of rational serpent demons, to deal with this anomaly.





Let your hungry little snake devour the elements it meets like a greedy snake



Consume three identical elements to unleash skills to clear enemies





Gain experience, Level up, Acquire enhancements and Create your unique build





Confront the waves of monsters and persevere until the end of the mission

item.title: TERMINAL22
item.description:
About This Game

Take back what they stole from you.

You are part of the temporary testing team for project BEYOND and have been provided with a machine that can hack into any device in the world. You are asked to hack into devices and gather information to test the capabilities of this machine.



TERMINAL22 is a mix of bullet hell and puzzle gameplay, utilizing the aesthetic of an old operating system terminal. Hack into any system you can find, dig around in the files and uncover the secrets about your identity, the testing program, project BEYOND and the company behind it.



...before long you may realize that you might not be the only one looking into this.






  • One of the two main elements of gameplay is hacking. Through the game you will need to hack into many different devices. This is done through a navigating your way through a bullet hell arena and finding all of the "Security Nodes" in order to break the security of the machine and access it.






  • Once getting into the machines, you will partake in the second major part of the gameplay, the discovery. Dig through the system by using terminal commands, discover files, go through them to learn the necessary information to progress further in the game.

item.title: Abyss School
item.description:
About This Game


Yuhee is an ordinary girl who attends a private school.
While waiting for her school bus, she picked up a bright purple conch shell on the beach.
She fell asleep on the bus due to unbearable drowsiness. What unfolded in front of her when she woke up was a school that had sunk into the deep sea and an abyss of followers following the high priest.
She solves puzzles prepared by Abyss Followers, avoids terrible monsters, and begins a journey to escape this Abyss School and return to her original world.


Solve hidden items and puzzles
while avoiding abyss zombies and traps at school.


▷ Charming characters
▷ Tense gameplay
▷ Simple controls
▷ Various skins and cutscenes unlocked as you play

item.title: Secrets Under Eco
item.description:
About This Game

Secrets Under Eco is a story driven first person metroidvania with a unique spin on fps combat. Explore the military base of Melior and its surrounding area while collecting equipment and powerful upgrades.

Game Features

  • Fully Voice Acted Story: Melior is about to win the war against The Others. Ready to fight with his people, Jay wakes up alone in a jail cell in his own military base. Labeled a spy, and with an unknown voice in his head, will Jay be able to escape his captors he once called his friends?
  • Unique First Person Shooter Combat: Enemies take damage by slamming into walls and obstacles. Defeat combatants by launching them into whatever you can using your equipment and wits.
  • Exploration: Search for a way out of Melior's expansive military base. Find equipment, vending machines, audio diaries, and combat boosting upgrades along the way.
  • Visuals: Secrets Under Eco features a pleasing low poly, mostly grayscale art style.

item.title: Eyes Of Memes
item.description:
About This Game

One day you had the bad luck to fall through from your reality into some otherworld. Such incidents sometimes happen and now it has happened to you. From now on you have only one task - to find 8 pictures and leave this strange place.
In terms of gameplay Eyes Of Memes is a classic indie horror in which you have to explore the location in search of pictures. You don't have any weapons, you are always defenseless against the inhabitants of the place and if you encounter them, running away is the only way to escape.

Levels

You just went to sleep in your cozy bed in your home and when you wake up you find that you are in some dark creepy place... There are 6 levels available to you in the game: Morgue, School, Basement, Game Room, Backrooms and Desert. Visually all levels look different, but your goal is always the same - explore the location and collect all the pictures.

Hazards

Watch out if you hear strange noises or notice something moving in the dark. The inhabitants of this world only at first glance look funny and ridiculous, but they are not! Run. Don't stop, don't try to hide, just run! The creatures that inhabit this place are far more terrifying than anything you've seen before.

Eyes

While wandering through this strange place, you can discover mystical eye pills that allow you to look through the monster's distorted minds.

Progression

For successfully completing levels, you will earn experience points that can be spent to unlock new levels and enemies. Playing on a higher difficulty level will require more effort, but you will gain twice as much experience.

item.title: Familiars.io
item.description:
About This Game

what is this game?


it's a compact monster-catching fest in an online multiplayer world. It also has some optional hard stuff for people who like a challenge.

what's it like to play?


  • 1 battle = 1 levelup, and the max level is 15. I don't want to waste your time with rpg grinding
  • with only 20 Familiars in the game, you can max-out and understand all the familiars in the game within a few hours
  • ... and then you're ready for the hard stuff
  • find hidden portals to other dimensions, where you must manage your familiars' HP and your potion supply in a slew of battles against fairly smart CPU opponents
  • or, if you want, fight other players you meet in the world to test your mettle

what else is there to like?


  • it's extremely easy to pick up, play a bit, and put down
  • the only way to communicate with other players is by pressing the "howdy" button repeatedly, or running around in circles
  • I think the soundtrack is pretty nice
  • it's free btw

it's free?


Yeah this is just a hobby project made by one person. I don't need to make this my job, I just like it when people play my game lol!

item.title: Two Climbers
item.description:
About This Game

NOTE: This game requires 2 separate players who own the game to play!

Journey to the top!


Two Climbers is a two player platformer where you and a buddy work together to climb a top Mount Teawok.
Filled with puzzles and platforming challenges, explore the different parts of Mount Teawok on your way to the top!

Work Together


Utilize unlockable skills that allow you and your teammate to combine your efforts to accomplish tasks that are impossible alone!

Find Secret Collectables!


Hidden Moons can be found throughout Mount Teawok!
Can you find them all?

item.title: Who do you want to date? professional girls сollection
item.description:
About This Game



A confident policewoman, a tough military woman, a flirtatious tennis player, or a gentle artist? Or maybe someone else? Who do you want to date?

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level



In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. (◕‿◕)♡

Special Features

  • 🎾 Animation scenes
  • 👮‍♀️ CG Gallery Mode
  • 🧹 Relaxing music
  • 👩‍⚕️ Puzzle game

item.title: Jumpfox: Always Running
item.description:
About This Game

"Jumpfox: Always Running" is a precision platformer that pushes the boundaries of your skills and patience. In this game, control is a unique twist – you don't control the running. Your character is in perpetual motion, always running forward, bouncing off walls to change direction. Your task is to master timing and reflexes, using only two actions: jump and dash.

Gameplay Highlights:


  • Automatic Running Mechanic: Experience the uniqueness of a platformer where the running is automatic, adding an extra layer of challenge and strategy to your gameplay.
  • Diverse Difficulty Modes: "Jumpfox: Always Running" features variations of the same map, each tailored to a different level of difficulty. From casual players to hardcore enthusiasts, the game scales its challenges to suit your skill level, ensuring an engaging experience for every type of player.
  • Solo and Multiplayer Fun: Whether you're looking to test your own limits in solo play or engage in exhilarating local multiplayer battles, "Jumpfox: Always Running" offers something for everyone.
  • Local Split-Screen Play: Dive into the split-screen mode for an intense competitive or cooperative experience with friends right in your living room.
  • The game's design focuses on minimalist graphics that highlight the gameplay mechanics, ensuring that your focus remains on the challenge at hand. The intuitive controls make it easy to pick up, but the game's difficulty curve ensures that only the most dedicated players will master it.



"Jumpfox: Always Running" isn't just a game; it's a test of determination, reflexes, and sheer willpower. Are you ready to take on the challenge?"

item.title: Far Lands
item.description:
About This Game

Get on the official Far Lands Discord Server:




Far Lands is a lightweight survival open-world game.

Lore:

You wake up and find out you are not home. In fact, what was home? There is no memory of that.

You are on a strange island and there is no time for panicking. Surviving is your only option. You start gathering food, crafting tools and building a base until you encounter something nobody sees every day.... A ZOMBIE! He starts attacking and you do too. He's dead for now... but who can assure he was the only one?

To find answers you start exploring more and more of the island, but the you only get more questions. Why are there are human build areas? Why there is no human life signs if there are human build areas? What was that skeleton?

Features:


  • Character hunger and thirst mechanics
  • Crafting
  • Gathering resources
  • Vehicle transportation (Buggy and MiniCopter)
  • NPC companion for Gathering Resources
  • NPC merchant
  • Procedural Spawning of resources and loot
  • Electricity
  • Hunting wildlife and fighting creatures
  • Base Building
  • Farming crops
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Weather changes

The game is lightweight on mechanics because I feel the player would enjoy the adventure and having fun more.
